## agenc config set

Set a config value

### Synopsis

Set a configuration key in config.yml.

Supported keys:
  doAutoConfirm       Skip confirmation in 'agenc do' (bool: true/false)
  tmuxAgencFilepath   Path to agenc binary used in tmux keybindings (string)

```
agenc config set <key> <value> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for set
```
